text: Iti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vangu vakanditungamirira mugwara rakatwasuka, muchitendero chechokwadi, chitendero chaAbrahamu chakatwasuka (kutenda muhumwechete hwaAllah nekuvanamata vari voga), uye akanga asiri umwe wemaMushrikoon (avo vanosanganisa Allah nezvimwe zvinhu pakuvanamata).”
